properties.name: morn.exception.enabled
properties.description: Enable exception features for the application.

properties.name: morn.exception.bind.enabled
properties.description: Enable bind exception interpreter features for the application.

properties.name: morn.operate.enabled
properties.description: Enable operation log features for the application.

properties.name: morn.operate.default-converter.enabled
properties.description: Enable default operation converter features for the application.

properties.name: morn.rest.prefix
properties.description: The default prefix for REST Message.

properties.name: morn.rest.success-code
properties.description: The default success code for REST Message.

properties.name: morn.rest.failure-code
properties.description: The default failure code for REST Message.

properties.name: morn.rest.message-suffix
properties.description: The default message suffix for REST Message.

properties.name: morn.translator.enabled
properties.description: Enable translator features for the application.

properties.name: morn.validator.enabled
properties.description: Enable validator features for the application.
